name: Vegan Cashew Cheese Sauce with Jalapeño

ingredients.notes: plus more to thin if needed

instructions: Soak cashews in water for 4–6 hours or boil for 10 minutes to soften. Drain before using.
Add all ingredients to a high-speed blender. Blend until completely smooth and creamy, about 1–2 minutes. Scrape down sides as needed.
Taste and adjust salt, lemon juice, or spices. Add more water 1 tablespoon at a time for a thinner sauce.
Optional: Heat the sauce in a saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring constantly for 3–5 minutes, until thickened and stretchy.
